Posts.Content: Fleur  This is what they do when you go for a check up I had the same and I had to wait for two weeks before I had to go and see the Dr for my results So don't worry just wait till you get your letter asking you to attend for the results its what all the ladies have So nothing strange I had a lot of bruising after having that biopsy and I did have a little pain the day after but that went but the bruising took a little longer to go I suppose its who does it for you So just relax and chill out till you go for your results ok don't worry we have all been there its nothing unusual just the normal routine the way they do things in the hospitals Hope all goes well for you    Hilary xxx
Posts.Title: Advice please - Breast Core Biopsy - Anxiously waiting for result...
